short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension that identifies preset keyword on webpage and throws popup alert message

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension that identifies keyword on webpage and throws popup alert message to user basis the keyword presence on webpage.The extension has two predefined keywords(Text keywords GRNT and NOGR in the code).The extension stays active and checks the webpage for the presence of GRNT and NOGRNT keyword and upon encountering the predefined keyword on the webpage, it provides an alert popup to notify the user that the keyword is present on the webpage which allows user to take actions accordingly.
